about_the_game:
Behind the doors of a nearby hospital lies a dark secret.

Join seasoned detective Paul Trilby on his quest to explore his odd little wall-divided society and uncover the secret experiments conducted in the mysterious Hospital on the other side of the wall.



Use your wit and deduction skills to solve puzzles encountered on your journey. With some guidance from inside the institution and help from the various citizens you meet along the way - after helping them meet their own needs of course - you might succeed in your endeavour. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip.

Follow the Meaning promises an intriguing story wrapped in a unique atmosphere filled with interesting characters, various puzzles and hidden object elements that are bound to satisfy your cravings for something… different!

Features


■ Pick-up-and-play
Easy to start but hard to put down

■ Captivating artistic atmosphere
Each hand-drawn setting you explore alongside Paul will delight and captivate you with its unique style

■ Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar

■ Average playtime: 1.5 hours

short_description: Follow the Meaning is a point-and-click puzzle adventure set in a peculiar town filled with folk who feel increasingly threatened by the rising authority of the Hospital and its Doctors. What is happening on the other side of the wall? Join detective Paul Trilby and help solve this crisis!
